<style>.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-0 { color: #CFCFCF; background: #1486C3; padding: 10px;  }
.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-1 { color: #D4D4D4; background: #35BC7A; padding: 10px;  }
.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-2 { color: #262626; background: #FF9F00; padding: 10px;  }
.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-3 { color: #262626; background: #F86923; padding: 10px;  }
.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-4 { padding: 20px;  }
.ie7 .art-post .art-layout-cell {border:none !important; padding:0 !important; }
.ie6 .art-post .art-layout-cell {border:none !important; padding:0 !important; }

</style>
